description.about: I am a dedicated full-stack software developer skilled in React, Node.js, Express, Postgresql, Vite, Material-UI, TypeScript, Redux and Nextjs. Additionally, I have experience with Java, Python, JFrame, MS-Access C#, Pygame, and ASP.NET,C++ which I am continuously improving and expanding upon. My passion lies in crafting innovative solutions, and I am committed to excellence in my work.

projects.title: Rankify-ai
projects.description: Rankify AI, a project I contributed to at Technologia Solutions LLC, is a powerful tool for content creation. This AI-driven platform caters to a wide audience, from solo writers to large teams. It seamlessly integrates with popular platforms like WordPress and Shopify, streamlining the content creation and publishing process. With a focus on generating undetectable and human-like content, Rankify AI empowers users to enhance their online presence.

projects.title: Edaly
projects.description: Edaly, a project I contributed to at Technologia Solutions LLC, is a platform to connect and educate kids throughout the world securely and reliably with AI
